pageContext.claim: “Conservative support for Trump wall soars to 99 percent”
pageContext.analysis: In this tweet, Trump linked to an article in the Washington Examiner about a poll conducted by conservative groups. The poll release said it surveyed 19,526 members of a conservative group from March 22 to 24, but the methodology was not published. Reputable pollsters have found sizable but lower support for Trump's wall among Republicans. Quinnipiac University released a poll in January showing 85 percent of Republicans supported the idea.
